oba batahira ratawala thathwaya gana kiyanawa.katholika palliye bidawatimen pasu batahira lokaye wiwidha anthawadi balawega shakthimath wuna.purusha wirodhi sthriwadin ewani pirisak.owun pawul eekakayata wiruddhayi.owunta awashya lesa sthrin purushakaranaya kirimath purushayan sthrikaranaya kirimath nisa batahira lokaye samalingikathwaya pradhanama deyak wuna.batahira pawul walin bahutharayak thani demapiya pawul.ee wagema daruwan wadipurama labanne wiwahayata pitinuyi.lankawath batahirakaranaya wima nisa nithi wirodhi gabsa wishala washayen siduwenawa.batahirin aadhara labala anthawadi kantha sanwidhjana walata gabsawa holsel kramayata nithigatha karanna awashyayi.namuth me rate aagamika balawega shakthimath nisa sthriwadin wani anthawadinta thawama karannata deyak naha.
